item.title: About me
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: I’m Vitaly Velikodnyi (RU: Виталий Великодный), a programmer. Experienced designing and developing Golang based software applications & micro-services, likewise tests & DevOps. Qualified to start contributing from the first day. Experienced in full lifecycle development, from idea to delivery, led 3-4 devs.
